name: Recoil (itch) (Kenks)
description:
Traverse the lands with your gun by your side and slay the king. Its recoil is a blessing and a curse, can you control it?

Playing in fullscreen is recomended as space/arrow keys will scroll the screen otherwise.

My first finished game project, made using Javascript for Miz Jam 1 in 48 hours over the course of a week.

Controls
WSAD/Arrow keys - Movement
Left mouse button - Shoot
No controller support at this time

Source code and Devlog
Soon™️

Credits
Sound effects are from LittleRobotSoundFactory's 8-bit pack (CC-BY). Link.
Visual assets, as per the theme of the jam, are from Kenney's 1-bit pack (CC0). Link.
Music and code by me.
